description: This file defines a React functional component 'ProjectDetailsModal' that displays detailed information about a Jira project, including project metadata, lead info, statistics, issue types, and roles. It also manages fetching project details via an API and handles UI interactions such as opening issue type modals.

methods.name: fetchProjectDetails
methods.description: Fetches detailed project information from Jira API and updates component state.

methods.name: getProjectUrl
methods.description: Constructs the URL to view the project in Jira based on credentials and project key.

methods.name: getProjectTypeIcon
methods.description: Returns an icon representing the project type.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a date string into a human-readable date.

search-terms: React component for Jira project details
